name: selenium-mcp
description: Control a Selenium browser from ChatGPT, Cursor, or other MCP clients using Selenium WebDriver.

tools.name: open_browser
tools.description: Start a new Selenium browser session.

tools.name: go_to_url
tools.description: Navigate the browser to a specific URL.

tools.name: click_element
tools.description: Click an element on the current web page using a CSS selector.

selector.description: CSS selector of the element to click.

tools.name: get_page_text
tools.description: Extract the visible text content from the current page.

tools.name: screenshot
tools.description: Capture a screenshot of the current page. Optionally save it to disk.

save_to_disk.description: If true, saves the screenshot to a local file. Otherwise returns a Base64 string.

path.description: Path to saved screenshot (if save_to_disk is true).

tools.name: close_browser
tools.description: Close the Selenium browser session and clean up resources.
